head.title: Power in the Shower: New Zing for the Bathroom

hedline.hl1: Power in the Shower: New Zing for the Bathroom
hedline.hl2: Power in the Shower: New Zing for the Bathroom

block.p: IF taking out a home-equity loan to renovate your bathroom seems too daunting, why not try a quick fix? A new rug, a mat for the shower stall or even a wall-mounted cabinet for extra storage can make a bathroom feel fresh and work more efficiently.

And for those renting summer houses, there is nothing better than something new underfoot in the bathroom. If there is a pool, why not add a colorful synthetic-straw mat near the pool-house door or have a wearable towel waiting in the changing room?

1. Keuco's Edition 300 mirrored medicine cabinet has a hydraulic door that swings open from the top; $3,970.89 from Davis & Warshow, 96 Spring Street (Mercer Street), (212) 680-9000 or keuco.com for more information.
2. Atran, a powder coated-steel medicine cabinet, mounts on the wall; $24.99 from Ikea, (800) 434-4532 or ikea.com.
3. Gaiam's cork bath mat is 24 by 18 inches; $24 from (877) 989-6321 or gaiam.com.
4. The Droog Mat Walk is made of cotton terry cloth; $44 from (888) 898-6422 or unicahome.com.
5. Saxan Rund, a 22-inch-round polypropylene bath mat, comes in eight colors; $4.99 from (800) 434-4532 or ikea.com.
6. Umbra's Conceal towel shelf is made of powder-coated steel; $19 from (800) 387-5122 or umbra.com.
7. A shower radio in the shape of a faucet attaches to the wall with suction; $30 from Mxyplyzyk, 125 Greenwich Avenue (13th Street), (800) 243-9810 or mxyplyzyk.com.
8. Woven plastic mats, in various hot colors, are 28 by 51 inches; $45 at Roberta Roller Rabbit, 1019 Lexington Avenue (73rd Street), (212) 772-7200.
9. Nexio, a stainless-steel and frosted-glass medicine cabinet by Blomus, is $167.39. For stores: (618) 395-2400 or blomus.com.
10. Horchow's 39-inch-diameter Rose bath mat is 100 percent cotton; $225 from (877) 944-9888 or horchow.com.
11. A 39 1/2-inch-long bathtub mat is $16.99; (800) 642-2112 or improvementscatalog.com.
12. A wearable Turkish towel is $59.95; (800) 321-1484 or hammacher.com.
13. Ikea's Molger mirror-and-cabinet unit is $49.99; ikea.com.
14. The Sensor Soap Pump, which delivers soap hands-free, keeps dirty fingers off the dispenser as well as off the bar of soap; $39.99 from (888) 988-8880 or simplehuman.com.
15. The Dinghy Drain Stopper is $12.95; (800) 243-9810 or mxyplyzyk.com.
16. A 23-inch-round shower-stall mat is $11.99; improvementscatalog.com or (800) 642-2112.
